headline: Learn more about Workers Sites at Austin & San Francisco Meetups

description: Last Friday, at the end of Cloudflareâ€™s 9th birthday week, we announced Workers Sites. Now, using the Wrangler CLI, you can deploy entire websites directly to the Cloudflare Network using Cloudflare Workers and Workers KV.
